projects.title: Keyphrase Extraction
projects.description: A Natural Language Processing (NLP) tool to extract the most relevant keyphrases from documents or user input, useful for summarization and SEO.

projects.title: Spotify Clone
projects.description: A fully responsive music streaming web app built with modern web technologies that mimics Spotify's core features such as authentication, playlists, and audio playback.
